content: उद्देशः {@--1@} Pointing to or at, directing; सूर्योद्देशेन तिला दातव्याः <ls>Pt. 2</ls> in the name of. {@--2@} Mention, specification; सार्धप्रहरद्वयोद्देशे <ls>Pt. 5</ls>; स्वरसंस्कारोद्देशः <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--3@} Illustration, explanation, exemplification. {@--4@} Ascertainment, determination, inquiry, investigation, search. {@--5@} A brief statement or account; एष तूद्देशतः प्रोक्तो विभूतेर्विस्तरो मया <ls>Bg. 10. 40.</ls> {@--6@} Assignment, allotment. {@--7@} Stipulation, bargain. {@--8@} Object, motive. {@--9@} A spot, region, place; अहो प्रवातसुभगोयमुद्देशः <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; <ls>M. 3</ls>; वन° a part of the forest. {@--10@} Upper region, high position. {@--11@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) The enunciation of a thing by its name (which is to be further discussed and explained), the other two processes being लक्षण and परीक्षा.
